title: BRIEF-Walmart to expand online grocery delivery to more than 40 pct of U.S. households by end of 2018
text: Market News March 14, 2018 / 4:13 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Walmart to expand online grocery delivery to more than 40 pct of U.S. households by end of 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - Walmart: * SAYS ONLINE GROCERY DELIVERY, AVAILABLE TODAY IN SIX MARKETS, WILL GROW TO SERVE MORE THAN 100 METRO AREAS ACROSS U.S. * SAYS IT PLANS TO EXPAND ITS ONLINE GROCERY DELIVERY OPTION TO MORE THAN 40 PERCENT OF U.S. HOUSEHOLDS BY END OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
